title: Word Chain

fields.name: Example of Word Chain (2290) in play:
fields.value:
Host: **S**
Player 1: **Spectacular** (Gains ⛓️ color)
Player 2: **Supreme** (Turn is skipped, will draw 2 x 1 cards after)
Player 3: **Real** (Gains chain color)

desc:
Post 2290
- At the beginning, the host chooses a random letter and posts it in the current game chat.
- To give the ⛓️ color to 1 of your cards __and__ before you take a turn, you must send a word in the game chat that starts with the last letter of the previous valid word.
- All losers (people who forget to do this) will draw 2x the times they have broken or forgotten the chain and have their turn skipped. All winners discard a card.
- Chain Break: 2 rounds pass or 3 people break or forget the chain.
